---
title: "Reformational Philosophy and Ethics of Technology (RPET)"
---

Welcome to the official website of the Reformational Philosophy and Ethics of Technology (RPET) group.

Our mission is to explore and promote ethical practices in technology development and application, grounded in reformational philosophy. We aim to bridge the gap between technological advancements and ethical considerations, fostering a responsible and sustainable future.

### What We Do
- Conduct research on the ethical implications of emerging technologies.
- Organize workshops, seminars, and conferences to discuss key issues in technology ethics.
- Collaborate with academic, industrial, and governmental organizations to promote ethical technology practices.

### Join Us
We welcome individuals and organizations interested in contributing to our mission. Whether you're a researcher, practitioner, or enthusiast, there's a place for you in RPET.

Feel free to explore our website to learn more about our activities, members, and upcoming events.
